presentationColumns.name: Landing Page Time
presentationColumns.description: The total amount of time visitors spent on a Landing Page in seconds.

presentationColumns.name: # of Landing Page Views
presentationColumns.description: The number of times the landing page was viewed. If a visitor visits the page multiple times, all those views are counted.

presentationColumns.name: Average Landing Page Time
presentationColumns.description: The average amount of time spent on a Landing page. This metric is computed as follow: (Landing Page Time/Landing Page Views)
